text: Melissa McBride (born May 23, 1965 near Lexington, Kentucky) is an American movie and TV actress and casting director. She has performed in many television programs and movies.Melissa McBride She plays Carol Peletier in The Walking Dead. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: Melissa McBride
